title: U.S. advanced flat glass prices in 1999 and 2019 by glass type
summary: The graph presents data on the readership of the bible in the united in 2018 and 2019 . During the 2019 survey , 31 percent of the people stated they never read the bible , an increase of one percent from the previous year . However , more people in 2019 stated that they read the bible every day compared to 2018 .
gold: This statistic shows theadvanced flat glass prices in the United States in 1999 , and forecast figures for 2019 . In 1999 , safety glass cost 4.08 dollars per square foot .
